mode.description: Select the mode for the date, date - for a single date, range - for the selected date range
mode.description_zh: 选择日期的模式，date-为单个日期，range-为选择日期范围

:v-model.description: Boolean variables to control the pop-up and collapse of the calendar
:v-model.description_zh: 布尔值变量，用于控制日历的弹出与收起

safe-area-inset-bottom.description: Whether to enable the bottom safe zone adaptation
safe-area-inset-bottom.description_zh: 是否开启底部安全区适配

change-year.description: Whether to display the button at the top to toggle the year direction
change-year.description_zh: 是否显示顶部的切换年份方向的按钮

change-month.description: Whether to display the button at the top to switch the direction of the month
change-month.description_zh: 是否显示顶部的切换月份方向的按钮

max-year.description: The maximum year that can be switched

min-year.description: The smallest year that can be switched

border-radius.description: The fillet values on the left and right sides of the top pop-up window, in rpx
border-radius.description_zh: 弹窗顶部左右两边的圆角值，单位rpx

mask-close-able.description: Whether to allow the calendar to be turned off by clicking on the mask
mask-close-able.description_zh: 是否允许通过点击遮罩关闭日历

month-arrow-color.description_zh: 月份切换按钮箭头颜色

year-arrow-color.description_zh: 年份切换按钮箭头颜色

color.description: The default color of the date font

active-bg-color.description: The background color of the start/end date buttons
active-bg-color.description_zh: 起始/结束日期按钮的背景色

z-index.description: The value of the z-index when it pops up

active-color.description: The font color of the start/end date buttons
active-color.description_zh: 起始/结束日期按钮的字体颜色

range-bg-color.description: The background color of the area between the start/end dates
range-bg-color.description_zh: 起始/结束日期之间的区域的背景颜色

range-color.description: Select the font color in the range

start-text.description: Tooltip text at the bottom of the start date
start-text.description_zh: 起始日期底部的提示文字

end-text.description: Tooltip text at the bottom of the end date
end-text.description_zh: 结束日期底部的提示文字

btn-type.description: At the bottom, determine the theme of the button

toolTip.description: If you set a slot named tooltip, this parameter will not work
toolTip.description_zh: 顶部提示文字，如设置名为tooltip的slot，此参数将失效

closeable.description: Whether to display the close icon in the upper right corner
closeable.description_zh: 是否显示右上角的关闭图标

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when you click the OK button in the upper right corner
events.description_zh: 点击右上角确定按钮时触发
events.params: 选择日期相关的返回参数

slots.name: tooltip
slots.description: Customize what's at the top of the calendar
slots.description_zh: 自定义日历顶部的内容
